# Very Good Chocolate (베리굿초콜릿)

> Premium handcrafted bean-to-bar chocolates from Daegu, Korea.
> Founded by a Le Cordon Bleu Paris trained chocolatier.
> Philosophy: "Less Sweet, More Deep" - focusing on cacao depth over sweetness.

## About
Very Good Chocolate is a premium artisan chocolate brand based in Daegu, South Korea. We specialize in bean-to-bar chocolates using Belgian couverture chocolate and HACCP-certified production facilities. Our founder trained at Le Cordon Bleu Paris and brings international expertise to traditional Korean aesthetics.
